casebody.head_matter:
349 A.2d 910
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. David A. MYRICK, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 29, 1976.
John J. Dean, John R. Smith, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
